scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution.  The attacker leverages a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes such as income and credit score from the model's predictions.
initial_goal: Infer customer demographics (income, credit score, age) from the deployed churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: The deployed model predicts customer churn based on anonymized data, but the attacker aims to invert the model to recover sensitive customer attributes.
